name: the_kitchen-typescript
description: npm init -y npm install --save-dev typescript npx tsc --init npm install express dotenv cors helmet morgan npm install --save-dev typescript @types/node @types/express npm install sequelize mysql2 npm install --save-dev @types/sequelize npm install jsonwebtoken bcrypt npm install --save-dev @types/jsonwebtoken @types/bcrypt npx sequelize-cli init npx sequelize-cli model:generate --name ContactMessage --attributes name:string,email:string,subject:string,message:text,status:string
